detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Hmmm......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ara, Yoshiko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Karin. I didn‚Äôt think you‚Äôd come to this kind of clothing store.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Really? I go to a lot of different stores. Anyway, the skirt you‚Äôre holding looks pretty good. It suits you, Yoshiko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It‚Äôs Yohane, not Yoshiko. ...Karin, which do you think is better, this skirt or the skirt on display over there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Let me see...... I think the flared skirt over there would fit your current outfit more. The skirt you‚Äôre holding would fit this blouse over here more.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wow...! You‚Äôre right...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Would you like me to coordinate some outfits for you? This store has a lot of things that would look good on you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Of course! ùÖ† Give me a moment, Yoshiko-chan, I‚Äôll grab a bunch of nice items for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
